generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with cars parked along the sides and people walking in the middle, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area on the right side of the road, separated by a curb, where pedestrians are walking, indicating it is a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story residential buildings are visible on both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sidewalk and in front of the buildings.
- terrain: Grass is visible on the right side of the sidewalk.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing as a bright, open area.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the road and sidewalk.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the street on both sides.
- truck: A white van is parked on the right side of the street, which can be classified as a truck.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those holding traffic signs and streetlights.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
